text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeURITypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0204 defines the following codes in a Is-A heirarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
A Alias nameAlias nameAliasname
L Legal nameLegal namegesetzlicher Name
D Display nameDisplay nameangezeigter Name
SL Stock exchange listing nameStock exchange listing nameBörsenlistenname

name: OrganizationalNameType
title: organizationalNameType
description: Code system of concepts used to specify the type of name for an organization i.e., legal name, display name.   Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the XON and PD1 segments.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0204 (Organizational Name Type)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
